answers.author: Jessica Roth
answers.text:
Suwanee, GA has a policy.  Employees whose jobs require them to be readily accessible for frequent or critical contact have two options for cell phones.  They can either use a City-issued phone that is for business use only - no personal calls.  Or, they can purchase and use a personal phone and the City provides a stipend for the monthly service charges.  Our policy is attached.

author: Leslie Hansbarger
text: Loudoun County, VA is interested in finding out if any localities provide employee reimbursements using personal cell phones for local government calls, and if so, would like to see copy of policy. Information can be also be forwarded to Janet Romanchyk, Controller at janet.romanchyk@loudoun.gov.
title: Personal Cell Phone Reimbursements
